text: hajjâ€Œgagi nirdista tingalugalive. A avadhiyalli hajj yatreya hone hottavanu (tilidirali;) hajjâ€Œnalli aslilate salladu, yavude papakrtya salladu mattu jagala salladu. Nivu maduva pratiyondu satkaryavannu allahanu tilidiruttane. (Yatreya vele) avasyaka yatrasadhanagalannu jotegittukolliri. Nijavagi, dharmanistheye atyuttama yatrasadhanavagide. Bud'dhiyullavare, nanage matra anjiri
